ComicInfo.Series: Monster Fighters Inc.: The Black Book
ComicInfo.Summary: "Something wicked this way comes..." A 15th century slip of the pen has somehow created the 21st century's Most dangerous typographical error. The infamous Libro Nero is missing the word 'not' from its Ten Commandments and somehow has become a conduit for dark magic. Vampire hordes conspire to use the book to conjure up rivers of blood; some Neo-Nazis are convinced its the key to world domination; and the Demon of all Demons covets this ultimate sinner's self-help guide for his library. Everyone wants "The Wicked Bible." And the Monster Fighters have it. But what are a bunch of super-powered teenagers supposed to do with such a powerful device? This completely self-contained one shot special Intensifies the scary bits in our most action oriented story yet and includes exclusive behind-the-scenes material and new fan inspired costumes for Porte, Rapunzel and Amanda Firestarter! 24 pages of story and bonus features make this special reader friendly and guaranteed comic book fun.
ComicInfo.Title: The Black Book
